meanings.sent1: I found some benj in my piggy bank.
meanings.sent2: He had to work hard to earn enough benj for a new bike.
meanings.sent3: The leprechaun's pot of gold was overflowing with shiny benj.
meanings.sent4: Her savings account was a treasure trove of colorful benj.
meanings.sent5: The thief's eyes gleamed at the sight of the stolen benj.

meanings.definition: To hit or strike someone or something forcefully.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally benjed his toe against the table.
meanings.sent2: The boxer delivered a powerful benj to his opponent's jaw.
meanings.sent3: The hammer benjed the nail into the wall with a loud bang.
meanings.sent4: The storm's strong winds benjed the trees back and forth.
meanings.sent5: The angry chef benjed the cutting board in frustration.

meanings.definition: A shortened form of the name Benjamin.
meanings.sent1: Benj is coming over for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She called out to Benj as he walked into the room.
meanings.sent3: Benj's friends always teased him about his name being so short.
meanings.sent4: In the yearbook, Benj's name was listed simply as Benj.
meanings.sent5: Benj's signature was just a quick scribble of his nickname.
